a.class: m-1 myriadpro-regular

div.p: To access FELTi 2021 we offer you different registration modes. Choose the one that fits your business goals and follow the instructions. Upon completing the registration, you will receive in your email the confirmation of your attendance, with which you can configure your account in FELTi 2021. If you give your consent, we will keep you informed about activities and content that will be of interest to you.

Registering as a visitor will allow you to access a private area where you can configure your profile; have meetings with other participants, through the Business Round; have arranged meetings with exhibitors and attend solutions and services presentations.

a.class: btn text-uppercase rounded-pill feria-see-all myriadpro-regular texto py-2 px-4

div.p: Registering as an exhibitor will allow you access to a private area where you can set up your profile, your own booth and apply to become a sponsor of the event. In addition, you will be able to access your meeting agenda; have meetings with booth visitors through chat; connect with other participants through the business round; as well as make a presentation about your solutions and services.
